Damaged packaging.summary: Several reviews mentioned receiving products with damaged or smashed packaging, affecting the usability of the product.

Missing items.summary: Some reviews reported missing items or empty boxes upon delivery.

Wrong items.summary: A few reviews noted receiving incorrect items or products not as described.

Bottles & jars.summary: Reviews frequently mentioned issues with bottles, such as broken spray nozzles or bottles not functioning as intended.

Boxes.summary: Several reviews highlighted problems with boxes, including damaged or incorrect packaging.

Bags & pouches.summary: Some reviews mentioned issues with bags, such as misprinted designs or faulty handles.

Personal care.summary: Many reviews were related to personal care items, including essential oils, sprays, and hygiene products.

Household items.summary: Several reviews discussed household products, such as cleaning supplies and storage solutions.

Health & wellness.summary: A number of reviews focused on health and wellness products, including supplements and fitness equipment.
